channel.title: Crucial questions
channel.description: i have a server that i really want to get online. my computer says my default gateway is 192.168.0.1 but i cant put that in for port forwarding. i have a router/modem from westell. my provider is verizon so i dont go to a westell page when i type in 192.168.0.1 so portforward.com is no help at all. i would also like to add music to the client so when it starts it plays my music instead of the crappy music it came with. my client is cody's client v2 meant to work with cody scape. another thing is that in some towns i have these, i dont even know what to call them. theyre like these weird loking things that surround the east bank in varrock and some other buildings. how do i get rid of these? another thing. jad is set to drop fire capes. he drops 1 coin everytime. why? also, since my server is a 508+ is it possible to add like saradomin swords because i have saradomin godsword and things but no saradomin sword. i would also like to add dragon platebody but if 508+ servers cannot handle these items i understand. i have played 508+ servers with working sara swords though. also, do i just need to port forward 43594 or do i need to port trigger it as well. and is a port forward for no-ip necessary? i really want to get it up and running once i fix the bugs but since i cant figure out how to do the port forwarding and have it work i cant. HELP...

item.title: Crucial questions
item.dc:creator: @senorlemon senorlemon
item.description:
@senorlemon wrote:

i have a server that i really want to get online. my computer says my default gateway is 192.168.0.1 but i cant put that in for port forwarding. i have a router/modem from westell. my provider is verizon so i dont go to a westell page when i type in 192.168.0.1 so portforward.com is no help at all. i would also like to add music to the client so when it starts it plays my music instead of the crappy music it came with. my client is cody’s client v2 meant to work with cody scape. another thing is that in some towns i have these, i dont even know what to call them. theyre like these weird loking things that surround the east bank in varrock and some other buildings. how do i get rid of these? another thing. jad is set to drop fire capes. he drops 1 coin everytime. why? also, since my server is a 508+ is it possible to add like saradomin swords because i have saradomin godsword and things but no saradomin sword. i would also like to add dragon platebody but if 508+ servers cannot handle these items i understand. i have played 508+ servers with working sara swords though. also, do i just need to port forward 43594 or do i need to port trigger it as well. and is a port forward for no-ip necessary? i really want to get it up and running once i fix the bugs but since i cant figure out how to do the port forwarding and have it work i cant. HELP…

Read full topic
